front.title: •The Gravest Of Circumstances
front.gametext: Deploy on table. If no senator here, you may place a senator here from hand to add 3 to a battle destiny just drawn. If a taxation agenda here, during your turn may place any one card from hand on Used Pile; opponent must use 1 Force or lose 1 Force.
front.lore: 'The Naboo system has been invaded by the droid armies of the Trade Federation.'

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
combo: The Gravest of Circumstances + Sanity And Compassion + draw Horoxx Ryyder Horox is a destiny 3, +3 for a flipped Senators objective, +3 if you can drop a senator from hand on the Political Effect. Congratulations, you just drew a 9 for destiny.

The Gravest of Circumstances + Taxation Agenda there + I Did It! Your Senators/Podracing deck is now a nasty inflicting direct damage/choke combo. The opponent's choices are basically: lose 2 on his turn, use 1 on your turn OR save no Force on his turn and lose 1 on your turn. (Joh) Yowza!

Anecdote: All effects and the objective were playtested initially, and then the agenda's and secondary texts were added later for the second phase of playtest. Political Effects only became "Political Effects" at this time.
